analysis.description:
Reentrancy in AngelCentralBank.angelRaise (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#653-705):
	External calls:
	- angelToken.mint(msg.sender,_purchasedTokensWei) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#684-687)
	- angelToken.mint(angelFoundationAddress,_purchasedTokensWei * angelFoundationShareNumerator / (angelFoundationShareDenominator - angelFoundationShareNumerator)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#687-690)
	External calls sending eth:
	- angelFoundationAddress.transfer(_actualInvestment * initialFundsReleaseNumerator / initialFundsReleaseDenominator) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#690-693)
	- msg.sender.transfer(_notProcessedEthWei) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#695)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoFinishTimestamp (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#698-700)

AngelToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#510-520) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-AngelCentralBank(centralBankAddress).angelBurn(msg.sender,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#517-518)

AngelToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#525-534) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-AngelCentralBank(centralBankAddress).angelBurn(_from,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#532-533)

AngelCentralBank.angelBurn (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#753-830) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-angelToken.transfer(_investor,_notProcessedTokensWei) (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#823-828)

AngelCentralBank.angelFoundationAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#603-607)
AngelCentralBank.firstRefundRoundFinishTimestamp should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#613-614)
AngelCentralBank.icoLaunchTimestamp should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#607-608)
AngelCentralBank.initialTokenPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#583-584)
AngelCentralBank.secondRefundRoundFinishTimestamp should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#617-619)
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#85-86) should be declared external
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#123-129) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#131-132) should be declared external
StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#203-205) should be declared external
Manageable.isManagerEnabled (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#302-306) should be declared external
Manageable.isPermissionGranted (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#318-324) should be declared external
AngelCentralBank.fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#651-653) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/7/0xe1f243a9abfeef646be6bef7b8c2018276574294.sol#1): it allows old versions
